Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Democratic legislators passed a bill to fund college for all undocumented immigrants using taxpayer money, when in reality, the law applies only to undocumented high school students in New York state.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the provided claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all Democratic legislators support and voted for the bill, which may not be accurate as individual legislators may have had different positions on the issue.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided in the claim.
